activities: Survata Inc. conducts market research online for companies.  We do not allow said companies to ask online respondents for personally identifiable information (PII).  Neither do we collect PII for our own use.  We use IP Address to determine the approximate geographic location of the online respondent, but we never distribute this information.
personaldata: We store approximate geographic location as determined by IP address.
recoursemech: We are committed to complying with legal or regulatory supervisory authorities that provide for handling of individual complaints and dispute resolution.  Further, we are committed to cooperating with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
